title: good 1 bed
description: A convenient, easy lifestyle beckons you to this exceptional home in Hershey Mill. Home was two bedroom, renovated and converted to a one bedroom with den. (Floor plan can be adjusted to suit your needs). The many updates and renovations, including to the kitchen and bathrooms, make this home a pretty, welcoming oasis. While summer days may seem far now, the private pool at Eaton Village is a wonderful plus during warm weather, as is the patio. Close to everything, and located within historic Chester County, Hersheys Mill has so much to offer, with its low-maintenance, carefree lifestyle a real draw. The parking spot and garage with man door are close to the home. From the front door, with a recently replaced storm door, the wood-floored foyer leads you into this lovely abode. The open-concept living room/dining room area has a vaulted ceiling with a window, and a wood-burning fireplace for cozy cool evenings. Sliders lead to the private patio, with plenty of room for summer barbequing and entertaining. From the living room/dining area, the recently improved kitchen is both pretty and wonderfully functional, with clean, white cabinets and Corian countertops, stainless steel appliances, and attractive wood floors. The charming breakfast area has a large window with a pretty view; the table and chairs are also available for sale with the home. A pantry closet allows for extra storage here as well. The main, carpeted bedroom is attractive, with lovely windows and two closets for plenty of storage. The main bath, recently renovated, has an oversized, step-in shower. The vanity is particularly eye-catching, with a marbled top and lots of drawers. The second bedroom, currently used as a den, is carpeted, with a nice closet and windows. There are also pull-down stairs here for attic storage. A recently renovated powder room is located just off the hall. Outside, the lovingly landscaped patio is perfect for enjoying nature. The garage, just a short walk from the front door, also has a man door for additional access. There are numerous amenities at Hersheys Mill, including a Community Center, library, pool, golf course, tennis courts, wood shop, walking trails, and opportunities for trips to museums and other attractions. There are so many group activities available, which makes the community appealing for social residents. For quieter pursuits, including birdwatching, the private walking trails are wonderful. Eaton Village, attractive and well-cared for, has newer siding, roofs, and walkways. The village also offers a private pool for exercise and cooling days during the summertime. Located within historic Chester County, Hersheys Mill is within easy access to the towns of Malvern and West Chester, as well as major thoroughfares, including West Chester Pike and Route 202. Its location is also close to Peoples Light theater, shops, restaurants, and parks, including East Goshen Park, a particularly pretty spot. Welcome to Hersheys Mill!

title: Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square
description:
Welcome to 1924 Spruce St! Nestled in the desirable Rittenhouse Square neighborhood, these new fully rehabbed apartments offer modern living in a historic district. The building has been home to prominent Philadelphia families such as Dr. John Hooker Packard, one of the most prominent American surgeons of the late 19th century; and the Philadelphia lawyer, Earl B. Putnam. Later covered to apartments in 1945, the most recent renovation was finalized in October 2022. The building holds eight (8) stunning brand-new units offering high-end appliances, including trash compactors, elevator access and lovely views of Center City. There are a variety of floor plans available for those seeking 1 to 3 bedrooms and you won't have to worry about laundry, as each apartment has a wash/ dryer in the unit. With so many attractions nearby, this location is the epitome of ideal: steps away from Rittenhouse Park, Starbucks, restaurants, shopping, and so much more. title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

Bright and sunny 1 bedroom, large living room, kitchen with stainless appliances including dishwasher, built-in microwave, extra large stove (gas range), plus garbage disposal. Modern bathroom with tub and shower, wood floors throughout. Central air conditioning. Extra entrance area space for your bicycles! This is an Avenue of the Arts / Gradate Hospital Area apartment home on a tree-lined street. Only 1 block walk to many restaurants and shops between 15th and 17th Streets. Easy walk (2 blocks) to artistic venues along the Avenue of the Arts, including the Kimmel Center, Wilma Theatre, Suzanne Roberts Theatre, University of the Arts, and all forms of public transportation along Broad Street. Parking lots nearby for approx $250-300/mo. Available 3/27/23
1520 Kater St #B

title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!
1426 Kenilworth St

title: Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Phoenix - Philadelphia's Premier Luxury Condominium. Located at 1600 Arch Street in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, Unit 1010 is an exceptional studio apartment with premium finishes and fixtures. The apartment contains a washer/dryer, dishwasher, ample pantry space, two closets, hardwood flooring, a high ceiling, and a modernized kitchen and bathroom. The Phoenix boasts a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, curated amenity space, including a state-of-the-art fitness center and weight room, a resident lounge with event space, a conference room, a bike storage room, and a spacious outdoor terrace with stunning views. Additional amenities include a full-service restaurant (Tir Na Nog Irish Bar and Grill), Starbucks, WSFS Bank, and a recently announced grab-and-go mart on the concourse level. The Phoenix is situated near some of the finest parks, restaurants, and shopping Philadelphia has to offer, with City Hall and Dilworth Park directly across the street. It is conveniently located with elevator access to Suburban Station and minutes from major thoroughfares I-95 and I-76. Tenant responsible for utilities. One-time move-in/move-out fee of $400. Valet parking and storage available for additional fees.
1600-18 Arch St #1010

description:

title: Wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home!
description:
Welcome to 244 S Warnock St! This is a wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home in the heart of walkable Washington Square West. Enjoy the convenience of in-unit laundry and central air for year-round comfort. Your living room welcomes you home with a sun-soaked atmosphere and a decorative fireplace with mantle and built-in shelving. Continue back to your gorgeous kitchen boasting tile flooring, wood cabinetry above and below, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, gas oven / stove, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to the 2nd Floor to view 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, and then to the primary suite on the 3rd Floor. This large primary bedroom offers abundant sunlight, good closet space, and an attached full bathroom for a luxurious lifestyle. There's a sizable brick patio for entertaining guests in the warmer months - schedule a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Washington Square West is a walkable neighborhood surrounded by convenient shopping, public transportation, and nightlife options. You'll be just a few blocks from City Hall, iconic South Street, Pennsylvania Hospital, Washington Square, Independence Hall, and the Walnut Street Theater. Close proximity to PATCO, Jefferson Station, the Broad Street Line, the Market-Frankford El Line, and ample bus routes. There are tons of local eatery and hotspots within small radius of this great home including Middle Child, Greenstreete Coffee, Little Nonna's, Strangelove's, Monster Vegan, Mixto, Dirty Frank's, Green Egg's Cafe, Yellowtail, and countless more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.
244 S Warnock St

title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Home on 1.34 Acres For Rent!
description:
Built in 1984, this Lovely Colonial home is located on a partially wooded lot in a charming neighborhood. This 3+ Bedroom, 2 ½ Bath home has been renovated and/or updated inside and out. Besides all new flooring and new interior painting, it boasts 2 1/2 New Baths and New Kitchen with all new Cabinets, Quartz Counter Tops, as well as new stove and microwave. The kitchen features a spacious center island, and two pantry closets. Adjacent to the kitchen is a roomy breakfast area that opens to the impressive family room complete with a large brick direct-vent wood fireplace, a great place to relax and unwind. The french doors lead you out to your new, low-maintenance Trex deck with step down patio. The main floor also features a formal dining room and living room with abundant natural lighting. The Open Floor Plan will make it a great place to entertain too. A second brick chimney, is located between the dining room and living room, with an electric wood stove. The powder room is centrally located in the hallway between the main entrance foyer and kitchen. Upstairs there are two bonus rooms (or extra bedroom), great for an office, entertainment kids' room, or exercise area. The sliding glass doors access your second floor balcony, which overlooks the beautiful backyard and local wild life. A great place to sit and enjoy your morning coffee or an evening cocktail. The Master Suite, with all newly renovated bedroom and bathroom, boasts a beautiful walk-in marble shower and dual-swing glass door. New recessed lighting, and accent lighting are found throughout this lovely home as well. The Second Bath, located in the 2nd floor hallway, is also newly renovated. The laundry is located on the first floor in the mud room along with a utility sink, just off the 2 Car Garage. The Garage has an additional area with upper and lower wood cabinetry/work bench, great for any of your projects. This home is truly turn key! Newer Air Conditioning and Heating Systems were recently installed. There is also an electric attic fan located on the second floor. You will be glad you decided to tour this amazing home once you see all it has to offer. Just a short walk from Evansburg State Park with 2,000+ acres of available hiking, biking, picnic areas, horseback riding, play ground, and fishing in the Skippack Creek, to name a few. Minutes from charming downtown Skippack Village with it's delightful 36+ Specialty Shoppes and 28+ Restaurants. Just minutes away from Providence Town Shopping Center, that includes Wegman's Grocery Store, Movie Tavern Theatre, and many other shopping, entertainment, and dining establishments. Exit 13 of the Northeast Extension, PA Turnpike and Route 422 are only minutes away. Located in a highly sought after area, this home is also in Perkiomen Valley School District. This house is definitely a MUST SEE!
Please give your mobile number if you are ready..!!
